ygData.messageBody:
1) Discovered just how many ppl don't know how to
group on Drinal. It's like mad monkeys. I've gotten
tired of the number of times I've gotten ignored. It's
not that I don't try to teach. It's that ppl don't
listen. <br><br>Now, I remember the first time I ever
grouped. I was SUCH a scrub. But I listened to the ppl
that had experience. I remember having trouble
figuring out what drawing was. LOL. <br><br>Yesterday, I
typed my fingers raw trying to explain the concept of
"drawing" and "giving our casters time to med". My fingers
are actually sore. <br><br>I actually dropped out of
a party earning mad exp b/c things were too pell
mell. Don't get me wrong. Badly organized groups can
make lotsa exp. Just too dangerous, and chaotic.
<br><br>Am I being too picky here? I might be losing
perspective b/c of playing this game too long. Don't have fun
in an unorganized group. Dying is okay as long as it
isn't stupid death. There's enough adrenaline even when
in a good group.<br><br>2) That being said-- any
tips on looting in groups? How can a group keep from
being bogged by loot details and stay well oiled?
Lately, I've had trouble not sitting down and trying to
order a group when I join. I feel bossy when I do that.
Hopefully other's don't think I'm being harsh or bad.
<br><br>I think I'm going to set down the policy that if
I'm lead in a group-- I'll always add new members
till I'm full. I've found that works well-- and
usually someone knows the choice places to sit in a zone.
=)<br><br>shooman,FatedHue-- out<br><br>PS... Sorry for the long post. Sigh.
I'm a long winded man/wood elf/ Iskar. =)I was also
in a strange mood to rant a bit. Thanks for bearing
with me.
